New Records: Mohammed Shami became the first Indian bowler to pick more than five-wicket haul in ODI World Cups
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 95, Shubman Gill scored 72, Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 54
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli is now the leading run-scorer in this year's World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: India kept their winning streak intact in the 2023 World Cup, India are now on top of the points table
Others: India defeated New Zealand by 4 wickets, Rohit Sharma scored 46, Daryl Mitchell scored 106
